list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a tube of metal, plastic, or other material used to convey water, gas, oil, or other fluid substances.
a narrow tube made from wood, clay, etc., with a bowl at one end for containing burning tobacco, the smoke from which is drawn into the mouth.
a wind instrument consisting of a single tube with holes along its length that are covered by the fingers to produce different notes.
a command which causes the output from one routine to be the input for another.
a cask for wine, especially as a measure equal to two hogsheads, usually equivalent to 105 gallons (about 477 liters).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một đường ống tươi của cảng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: convey (water, gas, oil, or other fluid substances) through a pipe or pipes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: water from the lakes is piped to several towns
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nước từ hồ được đường ống đến một số thị trấn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play (a tune) on a pipe or pipes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he believed he'd heard music—a tune being piped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông tin rằng anh ta đã nghe nhạc - một giai điệu đang được đường ống

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a bird) sing in a high or shrill voice.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: outside at the back a curlew piped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bên ngoài ở phía sau một đường ống Curlew

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decorate (clothing or soft furnishings) with a thin cord covered in fabric.
put (a decorative line or pattern) on a cake or similar dish using icing, whipped cream, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had been piping cream around a flan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đã được làm kem xung quanh một flan
